snippet: On Sunday, the University of Chicago found out that the envelope it received — addressed to a fictional character — had been delivered by accident.
abstract: University of Chicago receives package addressed to fictional character Indiana Jones, from The Raiders of the Lost Ark film; mailing was prop replica sold on eBay.
lead_paragraph: On Sunday, the University of Chicago found out that the envelope it received — addressed to a fictional character — had been delivered by accident.

headline.seo: University of Chicago Unwraps ‘Indiana Jones’ Mystery
headline.main: Need a Few More Clues? Fedora. Bullwhip. Archaeology.
headline.print_headline:
Illinois: Got a Map? Mail
For Indiana Jones Is Traced
